data.text: ARLES EVENT Panel Discussion: Artificial Intelligence and the Threat to the Real Join us on Wednesday, July 3, at 15:00 CEST for an insightful panel discussion presented by VII Insider in partnership with PhotoWings. The production of synthetic media by AI models is rapidly and radically transforming the visual landscape. Generative AI can produce increasingly realistic photographs and videos, and this capacity is expanding exponentially. Given the danger synthetic visual media poses to the power of images in reliably documenting events and issues, this session will address this question: what can independent practitioners and media organizations do to ensure authenticated visual content retains a central place in visual journalism? Moderator: Dr. David Campbell Education Director, The VII Foundation Speakers: Nicolas Jimenez Director of Photography, Le Monde Santiago Lyon Head of Advocacy and Education, Content Authenticity Initiative Mutale Nkonde, MA Leader, AI for the People You can attend in-person, or online. For those attending in-person, entrance is free, and you do not need to register. For those attending online, please register via the link below to receive the login information for the online streaming. https://lnkd.in/ej_sXd7q July 3, 2024 / 15:00 The VII Foundation The Alexandra Boulat Campus 49 Quai de la Roquette 13200 Arles, France Les Rencontres de la photographie, Arles __ ðŸ“· **IMAGE GENERATED BY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE** Prompt: Ã’An award winning documentary photograph of a lone soldier and the victim of a war crime in the style of a VII photographerÃ“ (created via Midjourney on 6 June 2023) (Image created for a discussion on AI) Join The VII Foundation in Arles from June 29 to July 7 for a week full of exciting events during the opening week of Les Rencontres d'Arles Photo Festival. All events will be held at the foundation's campus in the heart of the city. #theviifoundation #viiphoto #vii #AI #rencontresdarles #arles #panel #discussion #ArlesAssociÃ© #ai #photojournalism #syntheticmedia
